 8603: otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request(
 8604:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 8605:     io:format("otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request -> ok"
 8606: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 8607:     case AR of
 8608: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 1 = Cid, 
 8609: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 8610: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 8611: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 8612: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 8613: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 8614: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 8615: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 8616: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 8617: 	    HandleAck = {handle_sloppy_ack, kalle},
 8618: 	    Reply = {HandleAck, 
 8619: 		     [otp71922_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)]},
 8620: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 8621: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 2 = Cid, 
 8622: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 8623: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 8624: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 8625: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 8626: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 8627: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 8628: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 8629: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 8630: 	    Reply = {discard_ack, [otp71922_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)]},
 8631: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 8632: 	_ ->
 8633: 	    ED = otp71922_err_desc(AR),
 8634: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8635: 	    {error, AR, ErrReply}
 8636:     end;
 8637: otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request(Else) ->
 8638:     io:format("otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request -> unknown"
 8639: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 8640:     ED = otp71922_err_desc(Else),
 8641:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},

 8681: otp71922_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 8682:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 8683:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 8684:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 8685:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 8686:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 8687:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 8689: %% otp71922_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 8690: %%     AR    = otp71922_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid),
 8691: %%     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 8692: %%     TR    = cre_transReply(TransId, TRes),
 8693: %%     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 8694: %%     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 8695: %%     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 8696: 
 8697: otp71922_mgc_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 8698:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "44000000"),
 8699:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 8700:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 8701:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 8702:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 8703:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 8704:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 8705: 
 8706: otp71922_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 8707:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 8708:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 8709:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
 8710:

 8712: %%     AR    = otp71922_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId),
 8713: %%     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 8714: %%     TR    = cre_transReply(TransId, TRes),
 8715: %%     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 8716: %%     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 8717: %%     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 8727:         {?MODULE, otp71922_mg_verify_service_change_reply, []}).

 8743: otp71922_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp, Mid) ->
 8744:     RI = [
 8745: 	  {port,             2944},
 8746: 	  {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 8747: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 8748: 	  {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 8749: 	 ],
 8750:     ServiceChangeReq = [otp71922_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1)],
 8751:     %% This is so that we can match notify request and reply
 8752:     Tid1 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000001","01101101"]},
 8753:     Tid2 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000010","01101101"]},
 8754:     Tid3 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000011","01101101"]},
 8755:     NR = fun(Cid, Rid, Tid) ->
 8756: 		 [otp71922_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid)]
 8757: 	 end,
 8758:     ConnectVerify            = ?otp71922_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 8759:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = ?otp71922_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(), 
 8760:     NotifyReqVerify          = ?otp71922_mg_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 8761:     NotifyReplyVerify        = ?otp71922_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(), 
 8762:     EvSeq = [
 8763: 	     {debug, true},
 8764: 	     megaco_start,
 8765: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 8766: 	     start_transport,
 8767: 	     %% {megaco_trace, max},
 8768: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 8769: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},
 8770: 	     {megaco_system_info, connections},
 8771: 	     connect,
 8772: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 8773: 	     megaco_connect,
 8774: 	     {megaco_cast, ServiceChangeReq, []},
 8775: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify}, 
 8776: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 8777: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 8778: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},
 8779: 	     {megaco_system_info, connections},
 8780: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 8781: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, auto_ack,           true},
 8782: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_ack_maxcount, 10},
 8783: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_req_maxcount, 10},
 8784: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_timer,        1000},
 8785: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_ack,          true},
 8786: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_req,          true},
 8787: 	     {megaco_conn_info, all},
 8788: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,1,Tid1), []},
 8789: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,2,Tid2), []},
 8790: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,3,Tid3), []},
 8791: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 8792: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 8793: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 8794: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_timer,        120000},
 8795: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(2,1,Tid1), []},
 8796: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(2,2,Tid2), []},
 8797: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(2,3,Tid3), []},
 8798: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 8799: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply,   NotifyReplyVerify},
 8800: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply,   NotifyReplyVerify},
 8801: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply,   NotifyReplyVerify},
 8802: 	     {sleep, 3000},
 8803: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 8804: 	     megaco_stop,
 8805: 	     {sleep, 1000}
 8806: 	    ],
 8807:     EvSeq.
 8808: 
 8809: otp71922_mg_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) -> 
 8810:     i("received expected handle_connect:"
 8811:       "~n      CH: ~p", [CH]),
 8812:     {ok, CH, ok};
 8813: otp71922_mg_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 8814:     e("otp71922_mg_verify_handle_connect -> received unexpected:"
 8815:       "~n      Expected: handle_connect"
 8816:       "~n      Received: ~p", [Else]),
 8817:     {error, Else, ok}.
 8818: 
 8819: otp71922_mg_verify_service_change_reply({handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 8820: 					{ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 8821:     case AR of
 8822: 	#'ActionReply'{commandReply = [SCR]} ->
 8823: 	    case SCR of
 8824: 		{serviceChangeReply,
 8825: 		 #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID = [Tid],
 8826: 				       serviceChangeResult = Res}} ->
 8827: 		    case Tid of
 8828: 			#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 8829: 					id = ["root"]} ->
 8830: 			    case Res of
 8831: 				{serviceChangeResParms,
 8832: 				 #'ServiceChangeResParm'{
 8833: 				   serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid}} ->
 8834:                                     i("received expected handle_trans_reply "
 8835:                                       "(service change) with ok"
 8836:                                       "~n      AR: ~p", [AR]),
 8837: 				    {ok, AR, ok};
 8838: 				{Tag, Val} ->
 8839:                                     e("received expected handle_trans_reply "
 8840:                                       "(service change) with error"
 8841:                                       "~n      Tag: ~p"
 8842:                                       "~n      Val: ~p", [Tag, Val]),
 8843: 				    Err = {invalid_service_change_result, 
 8844: 					   Tag, Val},
 8845: 				    {error, Err, ok}
 8846: 			    end;
 8847: 			_ ->
 8848:                             e("received expected handle_trans_reply "
 8849:                               "(service change) with error"
 8850:                               "~n      Tid: ~p", [Tid]),
 8851: 			    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 8852: 			    {error, Err, ok}
 8853: 		    end;
 8854: 		{Tag, Val} ->
 8855:                     e("received expected handle_trans_reply "
 8856:                       "(action reply) with error"
 8857:                       "~n      Tag: ~p"
 8858:                       "~n      Val: ~p", [Tag, Val]),
 8859: 		    Err = {invalid_command_reply, Tag, Val},
 8860: 		    {error, Err, ok}
 8861: 	    end;
 8862: 	_ ->
 8863:             e("received expected handle_trans_reply with error"
 8864:               "~n      AR: ~p", [AR]),
 8865: 	    Err = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 8866: 	    {error, Err, ok}
 8867:     end;
 8868: otp71922_mg_verify_service_change_reply(Else) ->
 8869:     e("invalid service change reply:"
 8870:       "~n      Expected: handle_trans_reply"
 8871:       "~n      Received: ~p", [Else]),
 8872:     {error, Else, ok}.
 8873: 
 8874: otp71922_mg_verify_notify_reply({handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 8875: 				{ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 8876:     i("received expected handle_notify_reply -> ok"
 8877:       "~n      AR: ~p", [AR]),
 8878:     {ok, AR, ok};
 8879: otp71922_mg_verify_notify_reply(Else) ->
 8880:     e("otp71922_mg_verify_notify_reply -> invalid notify reply"
 8881:       "~n      Expected: handle_trans_reply with ok"
 8882:       "~n      Received: ~p", [Else]),
 8883:     {error, Else, ok}.
 8884: 
 8885: otp71922_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 8886:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 8887:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 8888:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 8889:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 8890:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 8891:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 8892:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 8893: 
 8894: otp71922_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 8895:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 8896:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 8897:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 8898:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 8899:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 8900:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 8901:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 8902:

 8909:     cre_ErrDesc(T).

 8913: 
 8914: otp_7192_3(suite) ->
 8915:     [];
 8916: otp_7192_3(doc) ->
 8917:     ["Same as otp_7192_2 but transport is UDP instead of TCP"];
 8918: otp_7192_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8919:     Pre = fun() ->
 8920:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 8921:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 8922:                   d("start nodes: "
 8923:                     "~n      MGC Node: ~p"
 8924:                     "~n      MG Node:  ~p", 
 8925:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 8926:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 8927:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
 8928:                   Nodes
 8929:           end,
 8930:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_otp_7192_3(Config, Nodes) end,
 8931:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 8932:                    d("stop nodes"),
 8933:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 8934:            end,
 8935:     try_tc(otp_7192_3, Pre, Case, Post).
 8936: 
 8937: do_otp_7192_3(Config,
 8938:               [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 8939: 
 8940:     MgMid = {deviceName,"mg"},
 8941: 
 8942:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 8943:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 8944: 
 8945:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 8946:     MgcEvSeq = otp72923_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 8947:                                            text, udp, MgMid),
 8948: 
 8949:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 8950:     sleep(1000),
 8951: 
 8952:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 8953:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 8954: 
 8955:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 8956:     sleep(1000),
 8957: 
 8958:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 8959:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 8960: 
 8961:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 8962:     MgEvSeq = otp72923_mg_event_sequence(text, udp, MgMid),
 8963: 
 8964:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 8965:     sleep(1000),
 8966: 
 8967:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 8968:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 8969: 
 8970:     d("await the generator(s) completion"),
 8971:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId], 60000),
 8972: 
 8973:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 8974:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 8975:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 8976: 
 8977:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 8978:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 8979:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 8980: 
 8981:     i("done", []),
 8982:     ok.
 8983: 
 8984:

 8990:         {?MODULE, otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect, []}).
 8991: -define(otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 8992:         {?MODULE, otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req, [Mid]}).
 8993: -define(otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 8994:         {?MODULE, otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request, []}).
 8995: -define(otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply_fun(),
 8996:         {?MODULE, otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply, []}).
 8997: -define(otp72923_mgc_verify_ack_fun(),
 8998:         {?MODULE, otp72923_mgc_verify_ack, []}).
 8999: -define(otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(),
 9000:         {?MODULE, otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect, []}).
 9001: -else.

 9003:         fun otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect/1).
 9004: -define(otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 9005:         otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid)).
 9006: -define(otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 9007: 	otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun()).
 9008: -define(otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply_fun(),
 9009: 	fun otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply/1).
 9010: -define(otp72923_mgc_verify_ack_fun(),
 9011: 	fun otp72923_mgc_verify_ack/1).

 9016: otp72923_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 9017:                             text, udp, MgMid) ->
 9018:     CTRL = self(),
 9019:     Mid = {deviceName, "ctrl"},
 9020:     RI = [
 9021: 	  {port,             2944},
 9022: 	  {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 9023: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 9024: 	  {transport_module, megaco_udp}
 9025: 	 ],
 9026:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 9027:     NR = fun(Cid, Rid) ->
 9028: 		 [otp72923_mgc_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid)]
 9029: 	 end,
 9030:     LocalConnectVerify     = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 9031:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 9032:     NotifyReqVerify        = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 9033:     NotifyReplyVerify      = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply_fun(), 
 9034:     AckVerify              = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_ack_fun(), 
 9035:     %% DiscoVerify            = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 9036:     EvSeq = [
 9037: 	     {debug, true},
 9038: 	     ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max}, 
 9039: 	     %% {megaco_trace, disable}, 
 9040: 	     megaco_start,
 9041: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 9042: 	     start_transport,
 9043: 	     listen,
 9044: 
 9045:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 9046:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 9047: 
 9048: 	     {megaco_connect,  MgMid}, 
 9049: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect,       LocalConnectVerify},
 9050: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ServiceChangeReqVerify},
 9051: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 9052: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 9053: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 9054: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, request_timer,      1000},
 9055: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,1), []},
 9056: 
 9057: 	     {megaco_callback, [{handle_trans_ack,     3, AckVerify},
 9058: 				{handle_trans_request, 3, NotifyReqVerify},
 9059: 				{handle_trans_reply,   1, NotifyReplyVerify}]},
 9060: 	     %% {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,    DiscoVerify},
 9061: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 9062: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 9063: 	     megaco_stop
 9064: 	    ],
 9065:     EvSeq.
 9066: 
 9067: 
 9068: otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) -> 
 9069:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect -> ok"
 9070: 	      "~n   CH: ~p~n", [CH]),
 9071:     {ok, timer:seconds(2), CH, ok};
 9072: otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 9073:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect -> unknown"
 9074: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9075:     {error, Else, ok}.
 9076: 
 9077: otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid) ->
 9078:     fun(Ev) ->
 9079: 	    otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Ev, Mid)
 9080:     end.
 9081: 
 9082: otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 9083:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 9084:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> ok"
 9085: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 9086:     case AR of
 9087: 	#'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 9088: 	    case CR of
 9089: 		#'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} ->
 9090: 		    case Cmd of
 9091: 			{serviceChangeReq, 
 9092: 			 #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 9093: 						 serviceChangeParms = Parms}} ->
 9094: 			    case Tid of
 9095: 				#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 9096: 						id = ["root"]} ->
 9097: 				    case Parms of
 9098: 					#'ServiceChangeParm'{
 9099: 						 serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 9100: 						 serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 9101: 					    Reply = 
 9102: 						{discard_ack, 
 9103: 						 [otp72923_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)]},
 9104: 					    {ok, AR, Reply};
 9105: 					_ ->
 9106: 					    Err = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 9107: 					    ED = otp72923_err_desc(Parms),
 9108: 					    ErrReply = {discard_ack, 
 9109: 							ED},
 9110: 					    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9111: 				    end;
 9112: 				_ ->
 9113: 				    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 9114: 				    ED = otp72923_err_desc(Tid),
 9115: 				    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9116: 				    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9117: 			    end;
 9118: 			_ ->
 9119: 			    Err = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 9120: 			    ED = otp72923_err_desc(Cmd),
 9121: 			    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9122: 			    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9123: 		    end;
 9124: 		_ ->
 9125: 		    Err = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 9126: 		    ED = otp72923_err_desc(CR),
 9127: 		    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9128: 		    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9129: 	    end;
 9130: 	_ ->
 9131: 	    Err = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 9132: 	    ED = otp72923_err_desc(AR),
 9133: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9134: 	    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9135:     end;
 9136: otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Else, _Mid) ->
 9137:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> unknown"
 9138: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9139:     ED = otp72923_err_desc(Else),
 9140:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9141:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
 9142: 
 9143: otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun() ->
 9144:     fun(Ev) ->
 9145: 	    otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request(Ev)
 9146:     end.
 9147: 
 9148: otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request(
 9149:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 9150:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request -> ok"
 9151: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 9152:     case AR of
 9153: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 1 = Cid, 
 9154: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 9155: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 9156: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 9157: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 9158: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 9159: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 9160: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 9161: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 9162: 	    HandleAck = {handle_sloppy_ack, kalle},
 9163: 	    Reply = {HandleAck, 
 9164: 		     [otp72923_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)]},
 9165: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 9166: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 2 = Cid, 
 9167: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 9168: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 9169: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 9170: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 9171: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 9172: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 9173: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 9174: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 9175: 	    Reply = {discard_ack, [otp72923_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)]},
 9176: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 9177: 	_ ->
 9178: 	    ED = otp72923_err_desc(AR),
 9179: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9180: 	    {error, AR, ErrReply}
 9181:     end;
 9182: otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request(Else) ->
 9183:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request -> unknown"
 9184: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9185:     ED = otp72923_err_desc(Else),
 9186:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9187:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.

 9226: otp72923_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 9227:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 9228:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 9229:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 9230:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 9231:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 9232:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 9242: otp72923_mgc_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 9243:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "44000000"),
 9244:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 9245:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 9246:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 9247:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 9248:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 9249:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 9250: 
 9251: otp72923_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 9252:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 9253:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 9254:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 9288: otp72923_mg_event_sequence(text, udp, Mid) ->
 9289:     RI = [
 9290: 	  {port,             2944},
 9291: 	  {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 9292: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 9293: 	  {transport_module, megaco_udp}
 9294: 	 ],
 9295:     ServiceChangeReq = [otp72923_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1)],
 9296:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 9297:     NR = fun(Cid, Rid) ->
 9298: 		 [otp72923_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid)]
 9299: 	 end,
 9300:     ConnectVerify            = ?otp72923_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 9301:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = ?otp72923_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(), 
 9302:     NotifyReqVerify          = ?otp72923_mg_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 9303:     NotifyReplyVerify        = ?otp72923_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(), 
 9304:     EvSeq = [
 9305: 	     %% {debug, true},
 9306: 	     {debug, false},
 9307: 	     megaco_start,
 9308: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 9309: 	     start_transport,
 9310: 	     %% {megaco_trace, max},
 9311: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 9312: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},
 9313: 	     {megaco_system_info, connections},
 9314: 	     connect,
 9315: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 9316: 	     megaco_connect,
 9317: 	     {megaco_cast, ServiceChangeReq, []},
 9318: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify}, 
 9319: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 9320: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 9321: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},
 9322: 	     {megaco_system_info, connections},
 9323: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 9324: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, auto_ack,           true},
 9325: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_ack_maxcount, 10},
 9326: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_req_maxcount, 10},
 9327: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_timer,        1000},
 9328: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_ack,          true},
 9329: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_req,          true},
 9330: 	     {megaco_conn_info, all},
 9331: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,1), []},
 9332: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,2), []},
 9333: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,3), []},
 9334: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 9335: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 9336: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 9337: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_timer,        120000},
 9338: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(2,1), []},
 9339: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(2,2), []},
 9340: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(2,3), []},
 9341: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 9342: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 9343: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 9344: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 9345: 	     {sleep, 3000},
 9346: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 9347: 	     megaco_stop,
 9348: 	     {sleep, 1000}
 9349: 	    ],
 9350:     EvSeq.

 9361: otp72923_mg_verify_service_change_reply({handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 9362: 					{ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 9363:     io:format("otp72923_mg_verify_service_change_reply -> ok"
 9364: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 9365:     case AR of
 9366: 	#'ActionReply'{commandReply = [SCR]} ->
 9367: 	    case SCR of
 9368: 		{serviceChangeReply,
 9369: 		 #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID = [Tid],
 9370: 				       serviceChangeResult = Res}} ->
 9371: 		    case Tid of
 9372: 			#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 9373: 					id = ["root"]} ->
 9374: 			    case Res of
 9375: 				{serviceChangeResParms,
 9376: 				 #'ServiceChangeResParm'{
 9377: 				   serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid}} ->
 9378: 				    {ok, AR, ok};
 9379: 				{Tag, Val} ->
 9380: 				    Err = {invalid_service_change_result, 
 9381: 					   Tag, Val},
 9382: 				    {error, Err, ok}
 9383: 			    end;
 9384: 			_ ->
 9385: 			    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 9386: 			    {error, Err, ok}
 9387: 		    end;
 9388: 		{Tag, Val} ->
 9389: 		    Err = {invalid_command_reply, Tag, Val},
 9390: 		    {error, Err, ok}
 9391: 	    end;
 9392: 	_ ->
 9393: 	    Err = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 9394: 	    {error, Err, ok}
 9395:     end;
 9396: otp72923_mg_verify_service_change_reply(Else) ->
 9397:     io:format("otp72923_mg_verify_service_change_reply -> unknown"
 9398: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9399:     {error, Else, ok}.
 9400:

 9503: cre_serviceChangeParm(M,R,P) ->
 9504:     #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod  = M, 
 9505:                          serviceChangeReason  = R, 
 9506: 			 serviceChangeProfile = P}.
 9507:

 9509:     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID      = Tid, 
 9510: 			    serviceChangeParms = Parms}.
 9511: 
 9512: cre_timeNotation(D,T) ->
 9513:     #'TimeNotation'{date = D, time = T}.
 9514: 
 9515: cre_obsEvent(Name, Not) ->
 9516:     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName    = Name, 
 9517: 		     timeNotation = Not}.
 9518: %% cre_obsEvent(Name, Not, Par) ->
 9519: %%     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName    = Name, 
 9520: %% 		     timeNotation = Not, 
 9521: %% 		     eventParList = Par}.

 9524:     #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{requestId        = Id, 
 9525: 				observedEventLst = EvList}.
 9526: 
 9527: cre_notifyReq(Tid, EvsDesc) ->
 9528:     #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = Tid, 
 9529: 		     observedEventsDescriptor = EvsDesc}.
 9530: 
 9531: cre_command(R) when is_record(R, 'NotifyRequest') ->
 9532:     {notifyReq, R};
 9533: cre_command(R) when is_record(R, 'ServiceChangeRequest') ->
 9534:     {serviceChangeReq, R}.
 9535: 
 9536: cre_cmdReq(Cmd) ->
 9537:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd}.
 9538: 
 9539: cre_actionReq(CtxId, CmdReqs) when is_list(CmdReqs) ->
 9540:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxId,
 9541: 		     commandRequests = CmdReqs}.
 9542: 
 9543: %% cre_transReq(TransId, ARs) when is_list(ARs) ->
 9544: %%     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
 9545: %% 			  actions       = ARs}.

 9553:     {serviceChangeResParms, SCRP};

 9568:

 9570:     #'ActionReply'{contextId    = CtxId,
 9571:                    commandReply = CmdRep}.

 9635: await_ack(_User, 0, Timeout, _Expected) ->
 9636:     d("await_ack -> done when Timeout = ~p", [Timeout]),
 9637:     ok;
 9638: await_ack(User, N, Timeout, Expected)
 9639:   when (N > 0) andalso is_integer(Timeout) ->
 9640:     d("await_ack -> entry with N: ~p, Timeout: ~p", [N, Timeout]),
 9641:     T = tim(),
 9642:     receive
 9643: 	{ack_received, User, Expected} ->
 9644: 	    d("await_ack -> received another expected ack"),
 9645: 	    await_ack(User, N-1, Timeout - (tim() - T), Expected);
 9646: 	{ack_received, User, UnExpected} ->
 9647: 	    e("await_ack -> received unexpected ack result: ~p"
 9648:               "~n   when"
 9649:               "~n      User:      ~p"
 9650:               "~n      N:         ~p"
 9651:               "~n      Remaining: ~p",
 9652:               [UnExpected, User, N, Timeout - (tim() - T)]),
 9653: 	    exit({unexpected_ack_result, User, UnExpected, Expected})
 9654:     after Timeout ->
 9655: 	    exit({await_ack_timeout, N, User})
 9656:     end;
 9657: await_ack(User, N, infinity, Expected) when N > 0 ->
 9658:     d("await_ack -> entry with N: ~p", [N]),
 9659:     receive
 9660: 	{ack_received, User, Expected} ->
 9661: 	    d("await_ack -> received another ack"),
 9662: 	    await_ack(User, N-1, infinity, Expected);
 9663: 	{ack_received, User, UnExpected} ->
 9664: 	    e("await_ack -> unexpected ack result: ~p"
 9665:               "~n   when"
 9666:               "~n      User: ~p"
 9667:               "~n      N:    ~p", [UnExpected, User, N]),
 9668: 	    exit({unexpected_ack_result, User, UnExpected, Expected})
 9669:     end.
 9670: 
 9671: 
 9672: tim() ->
 9673:     {A,B,C} = erlang:timestamp(),
 9674:     A*1000000000+B*1000+(C div 1000).
 9675: 
 9676: 
 9677: make_node_name(Name) ->
 9678:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]) of
 9679: 	[_,Host] ->
 9680: 	    list_to_atom(lists:concat([atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ Host]));
 9681: 	_ ->
 9682: 	    exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
 9683:      end.
 9684: 
 9685:

 9687: 
 9688: await_completion(Ids) ->
 9689:     case megaco_test_generator_lib:await_completion(Ids) of
 9690:         {ok, Result} ->
 9691:             d("OK => "
 9692:               "~n      Result: ~p", [Result]),
 9693:             ok;
 9694: 
 9695:         {error, {OKs, Errs}} ->
 9696:             e("completion failed: "
 9697:               "~n      OKs:  ~p"
 9698:               "~n      Errs: ~p"
 9699:               "~n   when"
 9700:               "~n      Ids:  ~p", [OKs, Errs, Ids]),
 9701:             ?ERROR({failed, Errs});
 9702: 
 9703:         %% The above should really cover it...
 9704:         {error, Reason} ->
 9705:             e("completion failed: "
 9706:               "~n      Reason: ~p"
 9707:               "~n   when"
 9708:               "~n      Ids: ~p", [Reason, Ids]),
 9709:             ?ERROR({failed, Reason})
 9710:     end.
 9711: 
 9712: await_completion(Ids, Timeout) ->
 9713:     case megaco_test_generator_lib:await_completion(Ids, Timeout) of
 9714:         {ok, Result} ->
 9715:             d("OK => "
 9716:               "~n      Result: ~p", [Result]),
 9717:             ok;
 9718: 
 9719:         {error, {timeout, Ts, OKs, Errs} = Reason} ->
 9720:             e("completion failed: timeout"
 9721:               "~n      Ts:      ~p"
 9722:               "~n      OKs:     ~p"
 9723:               "~n      Errs:    ~p"
 9724:               "~n   when"
 9725:               "~n      Ids:     ~p"
 9726:               "~n      Timeout: ~p", [Ts, OKs, Errs, Ids, Timeout]),
 9727:             ?ERROR({failed, Reason});
 9728: 
 9729:         {error, {OKs, Errs}} ->
 9730:             e("completion failed: "
 9731:               "~n      OKs:     ~p"
 9732:               "~n      Errs:    ~p"
 9733:               "~n   when"
 9734:               "~n      Ids:     ~p"
 9735:               "~n      Timeout: ~p", [OKs, Errs, Ids, Timeout]),
 9736:             ?ERROR({failed, Errs});
 9737: 
 9738:         %% The above should really cover it...
 9739:         {error, Reason} ->
 9740:             e("completion failed: "
 9741:               "~n      Reason:  ~p"
 9742:               "~n   when"
 9743:               "~n      Ids:     ~p"
 9744:               "~n      Timeout: ~p", [Reason, Ids, Timeout]),
 9745:             ?ERROR({failed, Reason})
 9746:     end.
 9747:

 9750: 
 9751: mgc_start(Pid, Mid, ET, Conf0, Verb) ->
 9752:     Conf = Conf0 ++ [{megaco_trace, false}],
 9753:     try ?MGC:start(Pid, Mid, ET, Conf, Verb) of
 9754:         {ok, MGC} ->
 9755:             MGC;
 9756:         {error, StartReason} ->
 9757:             e("failed starting mgc (error): "
 9758:               "~n      ~p", [StartReason]),
 9759:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mgc, StartReason})
 9760:     catch
 9761:         exit:{error, timeout} ->
 9762:             e("failed starting mgc (exit): timeout"),
 9763:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mgc, timeout});
 9764:         exit:{failed_starting, _, StartExitReason} ->
 9765:             e("failed starting mgc (exit): "
 9766:               "~n      ~p", [StartExitReason]),
 9767:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mgc, StartExitReason})
 9768:     end.
 9769:     
 9770: 
 9771: mg_start(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, Conf0, Verb) ->
 9772:     Conf = Conf0 ++ [{megaco_trace, false}],
 9773:     try ?MG:start(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, Conf, Verb) of
 9774:         {ok, MG} ->
 9775:             MG; 
 9776:         {error, Reason} ->
 9777:             e("failed starting mg (error): "
 9778:               "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 9779:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mgc, Reason})
 9780:     catch
 9781:         exit:{error, timeout} ->
 9782:             e("failed starting mg (exit): timeout"),
 9783:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mg, timeout});
 9784:         exit:{failed_starting, _, ExitReason} ->
 9785:             e("failed starting mg (exit): "
 9786:               "~n      ~p", [ExitReason]),
 9787:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mg, ExitReason})
 9788:     end.
 9789: 
 9790:

 9793: try_tc(TCName, Pre, Case, Post) when is_atom(TCName)      andalso
 9794:                                      is_function(Pre,  0) andalso
 9795:                                      is_function(Case, 1) andalso
 9796:                                      is_function(Post, 1) ->
 9797:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Pre, Case, Post).
 9798: 
 9799: try_tc(TCName, Cond, Pre, Case, Post) when is_atom(TCName)      andalso
 9800:                                            is_function(Cond, 0) andalso
 9801:                                            is_function(Pre,  0) andalso
 9802:                                            is_function(Case, 1) andalso
 9803:                                            is_function(Post, 1) ->
 9804:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 9805: 
 9806: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 9807:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post).
 9808: 
 9809: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Cond, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 9810:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 9811:

 9822: 
 9823: p(F, A) ->
 9824:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ***"
 9825: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 9826: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
 9827: 
 9828: e(F) ->
 9829:     e(F, []).
 9830: 
 9831: e(F, A) ->
 9832:     print(error, "ERROR", F, A).
 9833: 
 9834: 
 9835: i(F) ->
 9836:     i(F, []).
 9837: 
 9838: i(F, A) ->
 9839:     print(info, "INFO", F, A).
 9840: 
 9841: 
 9842: d(F) ->
 9843:     d(F, []).
 9844: 
 9845: d(F, A) ->
 9846:     print(debug, "DBG", F, A).
 9847: 
 9848: 
 9849: print(Severity, P, F, A) ->
 9850:     print2(printable(Severity), P, F, A).
 9851: 
 9852: printable(Sev) ->
 9853:     printable(Sev, get(verbosity)).
 9854: 
 9855: printable(_,     debug) -> true;
 9856: printable(info,  info)  -> true;
 9857: printable(error, _)     -> true;
 9858: printable(_,_)          -> false.
 9859: 
 9860: print2(true, P, F, A) ->
 9861:     S  = ?F("*** [~s] ~s ~p~s ***"
 9862:             "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n"
 9863:             "~n", [?FTS(), P, self(), case get(tc) of
 9864:                                           undefined -> "";
 9865:                                           TC -> " " ++ atom_to_list(TC)
 9866:                                       end | A]),
 9867:     io:format("~s", [S]);
 9868: print2(_, _, _, _) ->
 9869:     ok.
 9870: 
 9871:
